title: Evening in Hopi Land
marks:
Title, Date and Inscription

ULC, printed in bro in lower margin, printed in brown: [EVENING IN HOP
description: three young women, all wearing their hair in pairs of buns, seated on a rock by a pond in a desert landscape; girl at left fills a jug with water; girl in foreground wears dark-colored, long-sleeved dress, with white bead strands around her neck
creditline: Gift of Beverly and John Rollwagen
